name: ArcAngels and the Queen of Dragons
author: Arcanus

notes.text:
Used this from Legend 1 to KOG.
I think it's definitely worth main decking Fenghuang on the ladder, because more often than not you want to have an out to backrow heavy decks like GBs, Dinos and Burn.
Cosmic Cyclone is also a card worth trying, especially if you're facing Temple Burn decks like I was during my climb.
If you want to play this deck, keep in mind it's nothing like the old Cyber Angels deck. Do not go all in with Dakini unless you're at least 90% sure you can win on that turn. Most of the times, setting up a follow up play with Saffira is much more valuable.
